greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of tree-rooted loopless planar maps with n edges and no isthmuses.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
formula: G.f.: A(x) satisfies A(x) = G(x*A(x)^2) where G(x) + 2*x is the g.f. of A004304.
program: (PARI) \\ here J(n) gives A004304 as g.f.
seq(n)={my(g=J(n)-2*x, p=O(1)); while(serprec(p, x)<=n, p = subst(g, x, x*p^2)); Vec(p)}
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Apr 03 2021
